bill_title: provide for certain highway safety requirements and to declare an emergency.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for certain highway safety requirements and to declare an emergency. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The Department of Transportation shall provide for a speed limit within the municipal borders of Tyndall of not more than fifty-five miles per hour and the municipal borders of Tabor of not more than forty-five miles per hour on state highway 50 in the county of Bon Homme. Section 2. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The department may not authorize the destruction of any four-lane highway on state highway 50 in the county of Bon Homme. Section 3. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: For any four-lane intersection on state highway 50 within the county of Bon Homme, the department shall provide for certain safety improvements to include an intersection control warning system. The system under this section shall include safety lights indicating an approach to the intersection and permanent solar-powered digital speed monitoring equipment at the municipal borders of Tyndall. Section 4. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The department may not alter or destroy the intersection on state highway 50 and Bon Homme county road 303. Section 5. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The department shall reconstruct any four-lane intersection on state highway 50 in the county of Bon Homme to a ninety-degree angle. The department may not install any roundabout on state highway 50 in the county of Bon Homme. Section 6. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The department may provide for any safety measure or improvement to prevent accidents and save lives on state highway 50 in the county of Bon Homme provided that any measure or improvement shall be in accordance with the State Transportation Improvement program. Section 7. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The department shall provide left and right southbound turning lanes at the northern municipal boundary of Avon on state highway 50. Section 8. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the immediate preservation of the public peace, health, or safety, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
